name: Poppy
title: Keeper of the Hammer
w_dispalyname: Steadfast Presence / Stubborn to a Fault

i1.blurb: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Poppy''' periodically throws her buckler with her next [[basic attack]], which then falls near her target where it remains for up to 4 seconds. If the buckler kills its target, it bounces back to '''Poppy''' automatically. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

The buckler grants {{sti|350 '''bonus''' range}} and {{pp|20 to 180|color=magic damage}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}. When '''Poppy''' picks up the buckler, she {{sti|shields}} herself for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|3|key=%|showtype=true|15 to 20|1 to 13}} '''maximum''' health}}}} for 3 seconds.
i1.name: Iron Ambassador
notes: * ''Iron Ambassador's'' enhanced attack applies [[on-hit effect]]s as well as {{sti|life steal}} and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} (the bonus damage cannot).
* ''Iron Ambassador'' does not trigger [[On-hit effect|on-attack effects]] nor does it interact with {{ai|Help, Pix!|Lulu}}.
* ''Iron Ambassador'' can be prevented and mitigated by [[On-hit effect|on-being-hit effects]] from both champions and items.

q1.blurb: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' smashes the ground in front of her, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies hit.
The impacted ground becomes unstable, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies standing on it before erupting after 1 second, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit.
leveling: {{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 120*2}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 16% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
q1.name: Hammer Shock
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.

w1.blurb: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Stubborn to a Fault:}} '''Poppy's''' {{sti|armor|{{as|'''total''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''total''' magic resistance}}}} are both increased by 10%, doubled to 20% when she falls {{sti|health|{{as|below 40% '''maximum''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and generates a barrier around her for the duration, causing all enemies who {{tip|dash}} within to be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} and dealt {{as|magic damage}}.
''Steadfast Presence'' can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
w1.name: Steadfast Presence
notes: * ''Steadfast Presence'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Poppy's'' previous orders.

* ''Steadfast Presence'' [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u3JOjNR-eFE does not stop] [[dash|dashes]] that are classified as {{tip|unstoppable}} or they are {{tip|untargetable}} while dashing ({{ai|Playful|Fizz}} / {{ai|Trickster|Fizz}}, {{ai|Onslaught of Shadows|Hecarim}}, {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}, {{ai|Unstoppable Force|Malphite}}, {{ai|Twisted Advance|Maokai}}, {{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}}, {{ai|Void Rush|Rek'Sai}}, {{ai|Assault and Battery|Vi}}, {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}}, {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}).
* ''Steadfast Presence'' does not stop enemy abilities with small self-displacements (e.g. {{ai|Bear Stance|Udyr}} and {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}) because they do not count as "dashes".

e1.blurb: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|carrying}} them along with her for up to 300 units.
If they collide with terrain, she deals them the same {{as|physical damage}} again and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them.
leveling: {{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 140}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.name: Heroic Charge
notes: * ''Heroic Charge'' applies spell effects twice (once when ''Poppy'' hits her target and once she stuns them against a wall).
* ''Poppy'' can use ''Heroic Charge'' to go through walls provided her target is on the opposite side when she casts.
* ''Heroic Charge'' interacts with impassable player-created terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Emperor's Divide|Azir}}, {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}).

r1.blurb: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|channels|charges}} for up to 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} herself by 15% for the duration. ''Keeper's Verdict's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is set to 30 seconds if canceled.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Poppy''' smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that travels in the target direction. When it hits an enemy champion, a massive hammer erupts, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies around it. Enemies struck by the hammer are {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} an incredible distance towards their [[Spawn|fountain]].
Instantly releasing the ability ends the charge, dealing 50% reduced damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies around '''Poppy''' for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

'''Poppy''' has {{tip|sight}} of {{tip|airborne}} enemies and they are rendered {{tip|untargetable}} for the duration, with their displacement distance increasing based on how long ''Keeper's Verdict'' was charged. An uncharged attack does not render enemies {{tip|untargetable}}.
r1.name: Keeper's Verdict
notes: * ''Keeper's Verdict'' only interacts with {{cai|Last Breath|Yasuo}} when instantly released due to enemies hit becoming {{tip|untargetable}} for the displacement's duration when charged.
